short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rain or Shine is an extension that provides you with the current weather forecast for your own location!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing RineOrShine, the all-in-one Chrome extension that transforms your new tab page into a powerful and informative hub for your daily online activities. With RineOrShine, you'll stay ahead of your local weather and access Microsoft Bing search with unmatched convenience.
